abiDocs.name: claimOwnership
abiDocs.details: Allows the pendingOwner address to finalize the transfer.

abiDocs.name: renounceOwnership
abiDocs.details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

inputs.name: newOwner
inputs.description: The address to transfer ownership to.

abiDocs.name: transferOwnership
abiDocs.details: Allows the current owner to set the pendingOwner address.
